id: How to make 100k/month Selling Digital Products: Modest Mitkus Playbook
name: How to make 100k/month Selling Digital Products: Modest Mitkus Playbook
description: Modest Mitkus is considered one of the "big four" most successful Notion creators. He emerged around the same time as Easlo, Pascio, and Thomas Frank, but his growth truly skyrocketed in 2023.In this report, I'll go over how he did it, how much time it took him, and all the strategies that he used to build his digital business empire. In this report, you'll learn: How to do giveaways The importance of staying on brand Why quality over quantity Focus on high-moving levers The “waitlist” method Ab
features: How to do giveaways; The importance of staying on brand; Why quality over quantity; Focus on high-moving levers; The “waitlist” method
